Events.RelatedBody: We are using the **DocumentFormat.openXMl** DLL(version: **2.18**) in order to generate Bi Directional Chart in Word Document from bytes array(bytes array generated by reading Dynamics CRM Document Template) and **XDocument** (**System.XMl.Linq**). The Word Document was generated properly with other charts except Bi Directional chart.
